lib/file.js

Extensions for the fs module which we use often. Everything in here should work its way into someone else's library.

var fs = require('fs-extra'); var mkdirp = require('mkdirp'); var readyaml = require('read-yaml'); var tmp = require('tmp'); var writeyaml = require('write-yaml'); fs.readFileStringSync = function (path) { return fs.readFileSync(path).toString(); }; fs.readJsonSync = function (path) { return JSON.parse(fs.readFileStringSync(path)); }; fs.writeJsonSync = function (path, data) { return fs.writeFileSync(path, JSON.stringify(data)); }; fs.existsSync = function (path) { try { fs.lstatSync(path); return true; } catch (e) { if (e.errno === -2) { return false; } throw e; } }; fs.readYamlSync = function (path) { return readyaml.sync(path); }; fs.writeYamlSync = function (path, data) { return writeyaml.sync(path, data); }; fs.tmpdir = function () { return tmp.dirSync().name; }; fs.mkdirp = mkdirp; module.exports = fs;
